Name: Monkey Shine
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of cinnamon & sugar rim.
Review: Sweet, tropical fruitiness is offset by the cinnamon-spiced rim.
History: An adaptation of a drink discovered in 2003 at the Bellagio Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Nutrition: One serving of Monkey Shine contains 174 calories
